title.rendered: Hobart vs Adelaide, Australian T20 League 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Hobart: D’Arcy Short, Matthew Wade (c & wk), Caleb Jewell, Shadab Khan, James Neesham, Tim David, Asif Ali, Joel Paris, Nathan Ellis, Patrick Dooley, Riley Meredith

Adelaide: Henry Hunt, Matthew Short, Chris Lynn, Adam Hose, Colin de Grandhomme, Thomas Kelly, Harry Nielsen (wk), Rashid Khan, Ben Manenti, Henry Thornton, Peter Siddle (c)

Pitch Report

Venue: Bellerive Oval, Hobart

1st innings average score: 153

2nd innings average score: 138

Type: Good for spinners.

Weather: Rain forecast just before the game.

Wins

Batting 1st: 54%

Batting 2nd: 46%

Fantasy Tip of the Day

In the only game played at the Bellerive Oval this season, the spinners took 9 of 20 wickets – of which 6 belonged to the wrist-spinners. Rashid Khan and Shadab Khan will be itching to bowl on this wicket. Picking batters who are good against spin is likely to keep fantasy players happy.
